meta.name: Emotion Serene
meta.description: 宁静情感风格，淡紫配色，适合治愈系文章、深夜心语

base.container: background-color: #f8f7fc; color: #3d3a5c; font-family: 'PingFang SC', 'Hiragino Sans GB', sans-serif; font-size: 15px; line-height: 2; padding: 26px;

header_window.style: background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea, #764ba2); border-radius: 0 0 20px 20px; padding: 14px 24px; margin-bottom: 30px; opacity: 0.9;

headings.h2: color: #5a52a5; font-size: 21px; font-weight: 500; margin: 30px 0 18px; text-align: center; padding-bottom: 12px; border-bottom: 1px solid #d4d0f0;
headings.h3: color: #7c6fd6; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 500; margin: 22px 0 12px; text-align: center; opacity: 0.85;
headings.h1: color: #5a52a5; font-size: 21px; font-weight: 500; margin: 30px 0 18px; text-align: center; padding-bottom: 12px; border-bottom: 1px solid #d4d0f0;
headings.h4: font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 8px; color: #57606a; margin-top: 20px;

blocks.code_block: background-color: #ebe8fc; color: #4a4675; padding: 18px; border-radius: 16px; margin: 20px 0; border: 1px solid #d4d0f0;
blocks.quote_tip: background-color: #f5f3ff; border: 1px solid #d4d0f0; color: #5a52a5; padding: 16px 22px; margin: 20px 0; border-radius: 12px; font-style: italic; text-align: center;
blocks.quote_warning: background-color: #fdf4ff; border: 1px solid #e9d5ff; color: #7c3aed; padding: 16px 22px; margin: 20px 0; border-radius: 12px; text-align: center;
blocks.hr: border: 0; height: 1px; background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, #d4d0f0, transparent); margin: 40px 0;
blocks.quote_note: background-color: #e8f4fd; border-left: 4px solid #0969da; color: #0c3d6a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_info: background-color: #def7ff; border-left: 4px solid #58a6ff; color: #0c447a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_default: background-color: #f6f8fa; border-left: 4px solid #57606a; color: #57606a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.details: background-color: #f6f8fa; border: 1px solid #d0d7de; border-radius: 6px; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px;
blocks.summary: font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; color: #0969da; margin-bottom: 8px;

media.image_placeholder: background-color: #ebe8fc; border: 1px solid #d4d0f0; color: #7c6fd6; padding: 30px; text-align: center; margin: 24px 0; border-radius: 16px; font-style: italic;
media.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; margin: 15px 0; border-radius: 4px;

footer.style: margin-top: 50px; padding: 24px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea10, #764ba210); border-radius: 16px; text-align: center;

math.inline: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-style: italic;
math.block: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 15px; border-radius: 6px; text-align: center; margin: 15px 0; overflow-x: auto; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;
